name: Dead In Winter
description:
Dead In Winter

A short horror game for the 15th Rpg Maker Horror Game Jam.

The player crashes their car in the icy countryside and seeks shelter in a nearby cabin. Unfortunately the night is coming and something else seems to be out there is the snow.

I am a huge fan of RPG Maker Horror Games and wanted to try it. I would greatly appreciate any feedback.

Features:
  • Scavenge for firewood to keep a fire lit to avoid freezing to death.
  • Explore an seemingly abandoned cabin piecing together what happened there.
How to play:

The game should launch in the browser and can be played normally there. If this doesn't work or you want a download for other reasons just download the zip file, unzip it and launch the "game" exe file.

Credit: Assets Used

Sci-fi icons, used for fuel can. https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-goodscommodities . Thanks to ChaosShark.

Galv's Event Spawner. https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/galvs-event-spawner.61878/ . Thank you to Galv.

Event Size and Trigger. https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/est-event-size-and-trigger.48891/ . Thanks to Estriole.

Various RPGMaker Assets. Thanks to Gotcha Gotcha Games.

Team

Game Designer: Captain Toasty.

And of course to you the player! Please let me know what you thought of the game!
